TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Phlox, when you have time to spare after toiling away at your statues, I would deeply appreciate if you could deliver more templates soon to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> upstairs!
PHLOX: I would be more than happy to, but I delivered several stacks of projection stone templates to you just recently! Have you already burned through all of them?
DAZ: The voyager stone's development is nearing completion; I require more templates to craft and test more projection locations, before I can be confident in its use.
DAZ: You should pair with a memory statue to test the voyager stones sometime as well, Phlox!
PHLOX: Oh.. I was not aware I needed to be paired to a memory statue to use them. Is there a reason for this prerequisite?
DAZ: The voyager stones ar e designed to eptl eoyj pit ,r,ptu dyptshr dudyr, gpt yjr ,r,ptu dysyird trvptfomh smf ytsmdoyyomh rc[rtormvrd gtp, yjr /;sifobofmo rhy py lvsn ;pp[ mpoyvrkpt[
DAZ: That is how the voyager stone allows one to to to to to to
